author: roberto.bayardo
content: Speaking of the last call, it seemed we still lack consensus on transaction pool rules for blob transactions.  I wrote up this doc to try and outline the approaches and eventually capture what the various implementations have chosen to do.  Can the EL client teams take a look and comment / provide details on their implementations?  Thanks! https://hackmd.io/aVek93y-QmSv1mz2Agc9iQ

author: bridge-bot
content: <gakonst> Added <@806184091690598420> from reth who will be working on 4844 starting next week
